articles.author: Sam Meade
articles.title: Liverpool transfer round-up: Kylian Mbappe blow as he opens PSG talks - Mirror Online
articles.description: Links between Liverpool and Kylian Mbappe refuse to go away but PSG are looking to keep hold of the world class forward while the Reds are also eyeing a goalkeeper
articles.content:
Liverpool have rarely signed the finished article but Kylian Mbappe continues to be linked with an Anfield switch.
During Jurgen Klopp's tenure the Reds have often signed players who have the potent… [+2167 chars]
